HOW TO GIVE POWERFUL PRESENTATIONS The ability to communicate is one of the most powerful weapons in your professional arsenal. Communicating comes in many different forms, from professional writing <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/succeed/business-writing-tips>, to networking conversations <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/common-sense-networking-tips-independent-consultants-and-contractors-1> to presentations. Many of us fear public speaking, and the rest of us generally do not enjoy it. Essentially, a presentation is simply communicating your ideas to your audience. Whether you are presenting to a potential client, a keynote audience, or an existing client, it is essential to be able to deliver a message clearly, succinctly and effectively.
Most of us have sat through a bad presentation – from an overlong presentation to cringe-worthy slides. The messages may have been important, but they were most likely lost or diluted because of a poor delivery. Presentations affect professional reputation <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/building-personal-brand-and-why-it-matters>, so the ability to effectively communicate ideas is vital to the strength of any independent consultancy.
